Business Marketing Assistant Job at OPPO




        
    

        
        OPPO, founded in 2004, is one of the world’s leading innovators in smart devices and mobile technology. With operations in over 60 countries and regions, OPPO is dedicated to delivering cutting-edge innovation, premium user experiences, and stylish designs.

In Nigeria, OPPO continues to expand its footprint with over 290,000 points of sale and 1,900 official service centers — bringing the beauty of technology closer to people every day.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Business Marketing Assistant

Job Location: Lagos 
Employment Type: Full-time

Key Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Assist in executing indoor and outdoor branding projects (e.g., billboards, wall drapes, shop signage, brochures, flyers, T-shirts, souvenirs, etc.)
	Support in disseminating visual content that reflects the brand’s identity and values
	Help produce marketing and promotional materials across campaigns
	Collaborate with sales and marketing to develop and implement ideas and strategies
	Contribute to brand promotion via effective advertising
	Support in organizing company events and brand activations
	Manage and maintain branding and marketing inventory
	Assist in procurement and logistics of all marketing-related materials
	Track inventory and usage of promotional materials and advise management on restocking.


Requirements


	Previous experience in a similar role is a plus.
	Strong organizational and communication skills
	Proficiency in Microsoft Office and basic knowledge of marketing tools
	Ability to multitask, prioritize, and work under minimal supervision.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: cvpool2021@oppo-aed.ng using "Business Marketing Assistant" as the subject of the email.

	The ideal candidate will have in-depth knowledge of real estate transactions, land documentation, property acquisitions, leases, legal due diligence, and dispute resolution.


Requirements


	LL.B degree from a recognized institution and called to the Nigerian Bar
	Minimum of 3 years of post-call experience in real estate and property law.
	Strong understanding of land documentation processes
	Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
	High level of integrity, professionalism, and attention to detail.
	Strong negotiation, analytical, and legal drafting skills.


Other Requirements:


	Drafting, reviewing, and negotiating real estate contracts and other legal documents.
	Conducting legal due diligence on property titles, deeds, and land use rights.
	Representing the company in legal proceedings, property disputes, and negotiations.
	Liaising with government agencies for property registration, title perfection, and compliance.
	Handling litigation and dispute resolution related to land, tenancy, and ownership issues.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV in PDF to:&nbsp;career@firstfruithousing.org&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

&nbsp;

2.)&nbsp;Content Creator

Job Location:&nbsp;Utako, Abuja (FCT)
Employment Type: Full-time

	We are seeking a creative and results-driven Content Creator to execute engaging content across digital and offline platforms.
	You will play a key role in promoting the company&rsquo;s properties, brand identity, real estate projects, and services through compelling storytelling and visual content.


Requirements


	Bachelor&rsquo;s Degree in Marketing, Mass Communication, English, Journalism, or related field.
	1&ndash;3 years of experience in content creation, preferably in the real estate industry.
	Excellent writing and storytelling skills with strong grammar and editing ability.
	Ability to work independently, meet deadlines, and manage multiple projects simultaneously.
	Passionate about real estate and creative storytelling.


Other Requirements:


	Develop and implement a content calendar for social media, blog, email marketing, and websites.
	Write creative and persuasive content for property listings, blog posts, social media, and video scripts.
	Create video scripts of properties, site visits, client testimonials, and behind-the-scenes content.
	Collaborate with other teams to align content with marketing campaigns and property launches.
	Stay up to date with real estate trends and digital content strategies.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV in PDF to:&nbsp;career@firstfruithousing.org&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

&nbsp;

	Professional HR certification (e.g., CIPM, SHRM) is an added advantage.
	Must be Female.


Other Requirements:

	Maintain accurate employee records and HR documents (e.g. leave applications, disciplinary reports).
	Implement and monitor HR policies and procedures in line with labor laws.
	Handle employee welfare, engagement, and conflict resolution.
	Coordinate training, development, and performance appraisal processes.
	Support payroll preparation by providing relevant data (absences, bonus, leaves, etc.)
	Maintain confidentiality and professionalism in all employee matters.
	Assist in organizing company events, retreats, and team-building activities.


Method of Application
